Interface VirtualServerRmi

All Superinterfaces:
Remote, VirtualServer
All Known Implementing Classes:
RmiServer
public interface VirtualServerRmi extends VirtualServer
Extends the VirtualServer interface to include RMI-specific methods. This interface defines the contract for an RMI-enabled server, allowing clients to register themselves to receive callbacks.
